alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Evangeline; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 4:14PM CDT until July 22 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Evangeline Parish in central Louisiana... North central Acadia Parish in southwestern Louisiana... Central St. Landry Parish in central Louisiana... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 414 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Grand Prairie to Duralde, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Opelousas, Eunice, Ville Platte, Mamou, Melville, Palmetto, Port Barre, Washington, Chataignier, Prairie Ronde, Savoy, Duralde, Lawtell, Swords, Richard, Grand Prairie and Lebeau. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 15 and 37. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
